text: He majhya palanakartya! Mi apalya kahi santatila ya napika osada jangalata tujhya pavitra gharacya javala abada kele ahe. He majhya palanakartya! He asasathi ki tyanni namaja kayama karavi, yastava tu kahi lokanci mane tyancyakade akarsita kara ani tyanna phalanci roji (annasamugri) pradana kara, yasathi ki tyanni krtajnata vyakta karavi
